content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":157621,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピューンとハウゼルが飛び立っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"With a whoosh, Housel flew away."},{"lineNumber":157622,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こら、逃げるなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, don't run away!\""},{"lineNumber":157623,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、では火炎ちゃんもこれで失礼いたします……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, then I'll be taking my leave as well, Kaen-chan…"},{"lineNumber":157624,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラ様に、ランスさん……","translatedEnglishLine":"To Lady Satera, and Rance-san…"},{"lineNumber":157625,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当にすみません、すみません……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm truly sorry, sorry…\""},{"lineNumber":157626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、こら、火炎書士！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you! Flame Mage!\""},{"lineNumber":157627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……逃げられた、のか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch… Did she get away?\""},{"lineNumber":157628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……ようやく会えたのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch… After finally meeting her,"},{"lineNumber":157629,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんでこんなことに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"why did it have to come to this…\""},{"lineNumber":157630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それもこれもお前のせいだぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's all your fault!\""},{"lineNumber":157631,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　あそこになんか落ちてるぞ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Something's dropped over there?\""},{"lineNumber":157632,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラの話を聞けー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen to Satera!\""},{"lineNumber":157633,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはハウゼルの去って行った方向に","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance looked toward the direction Housel had left,"},{"lineNumber":157634,"originalJapaneseLine":"落ちていた何かを拾い上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and picked up something that was lying on the ground."},{"lineNumber":157635,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本？　なんでこんなもんが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A book? Why would something like this"},{"lineNumber":157636,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦場に落ちてるんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"be lying on the battlefield?\""},{"lineNumber":157637,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、うっとうしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really, it's so annoying."},{"lineNumber":157638,"originalJapaneseLine":"　雑魚共が俺につっかかりおって」","translatedEnglishLine":"These small fries keep bothering me.\""},{"lineNumber":157639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、こっからどうすんのアニキ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what are we doing from here, I told you."},{"lineNumber":157660,"originalJapaneseLine":"　というわけでサクサク帰るぞー」","translatedEnglishLine":"So let's head back quickly.\""},{"lineNumber":157661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm...\""},{"lineNumber":157662,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひぃー！　ま、待って欲しいだー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek! P-Please wait!\""},{"lineNumber":157663,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな所に置いてかないで欲しいだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't leave me behind in a place like this!\""},{"lineNumber":157664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「のろまはザクザク置いてくー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Slowpokes get left behind in bunches!\""},{"lineNumber":157665,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひぃー！　ランス様ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek! Lord Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":157666,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜――","translatedEnglishLine":"Night—"},{"lineNumber":157667,"originalJapaneseLine":"スケールの町――","translatedEnglishLine":"Town of Scale—"},{"lineNumber":157668,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍陣地、作戦会議室――","translatedEnglishLine":"Liesath Army Base, Operations Meeting Room—"},{"lineNumber":157669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦争には関係ないと思って","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought it had nothing to do with the war,"},{"lineNumber":157670,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わざわざ言わなかったんだが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I didn't bother mentioning it...\""},{"lineNumber":157671,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハウゼルは極度の本好きなんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Housel is an extreme book lover.\""},{"lineNumber":157672,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほほう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":157673,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってことはこれはやはり","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So that means this really is"},{"lineNumber":157674,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハウゼルの持ち物ってことか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Housel's property after all.\""},{"lineNumber":157675,"originalJapaneseLine":"昼間、戦場で拾った本をランスが取り出す。","translatedEnglishLine":"During the day, Rance took out the book he had picked up on the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":157676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、間違いなくハウゼルのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, without a doubt, it's Housel's."},{"lineNumber":157677,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほら、ここ見てみろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Look, check this out."},{"lineNumber":157678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハウゼルが使ってる図書館の刻印と、","translatedEnglishLine":"The stamp of the library Housel uses and,"},{"lineNumber":157679,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貸し出しリストに名前が」","translatedEnglishLine":"her name is on the lending list.\""},{"lineNumber":157680,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハウゼル、ハウゼル、ハウゼル……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Housel, Housel, Housel...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピューンとハウゼルが飛び立っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a whoosh, Housel flew away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こら、逃げるなー！」
「あ、では火炎ちゃんもこれで失礼いたします……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, then I'll be taking my leave as well, Kaen-chan…

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ様に、ランスさん……
本当にすみません、すみません……」
「あ、こら、火炎書士！」
「くっ……逃げられた、のか？」
「くっ……ようやく会えたのに、
なんでこんなことに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: why did it have to come to this…"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それもこれもお前のせいだぞ！」
「ん？　あそこになんか落ちてるぞ？」
「サテラの話を聞けー！」
ランスはハウゼルの去って行った方向に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance looked toward the direction Housel had left,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちていた何かを拾い上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and picked up something that was lying on the ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本？　なんでこんなもんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A book? Why would something like this

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場に落ちてるんだ？」
「まったく、うっとうしい。
雑魚共が俺につっかかりおって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These small fries keep bothering me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、こっからどうすんのアニキ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what are we doing from here, Aniki!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このまま雑魚共を殲滅するかい！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are we gonna wipe out the small fries just like this!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アホ、俺様の部隊は特別なのだ。
雑魚の相手なんぞ一般兵にやらせとけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leave handling the small fries to the regular soldiers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは私達はどうしますか？
また魔人ハウゼルを捜しに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do we go look for the demon Housel again...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当然だろう。
サテラ達の今の任務はハウゼルを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera and the others' current mission is to

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 止めることなんだからな」
「そうだな、ランス」
「……腹減った」
「帰って飯食って風呂入ってセックスして寝る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Go home, eat, take a bath, have sex, and then sleep."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、お前ー！
お前はサテラの使徒なんだぞ！
サテラの言うことを聞けー！」
「と言ってもな。
さっきの口ぶりからして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from the way things sounded earlier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼル今日はもう戦場に来ないぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Housel won't be coming to the battlefield again today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、それは……まあ……」
「ほれ見たことか。
というわけでサクサク帰るぞー」
「むむむ……」
「ひぃー！　ま、待って欲しいだー！
こんな所に置いてかないで欲しいだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't leave me behind in a place like this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「のろまはザクザク置いてくー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Slowpokes get left behind in bunches!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひぃー！　ランス様ー！」
スケールの町――
リーザス軍陣地、作戦会議室――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Liesath Army Base, Operations Meeting Room—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦争には関係ないと思って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought it had nothing to do with the war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ言わなかったんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I didn't bother mentioning it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼルは極度の本好きなんだ」
「ほほう」
「ってことはこれはやはり
ハウゼルの持ち物ってことか」
昼間、戦場で拾った本をランスが取り出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the day, Rance took out the book he had picked up on the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、間違いなくハウゼルのだ。
ほら、ここ見てみろ」
「ハウゼルが使ってる図書館の刻印と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The stamp of the library Housel uses and,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貸し出しリストに名前が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her name is on the lending list."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼル、ハウゼル、ハウゼル……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼルは極度の本好きなんだ」
「ほほう」
「ってことはこれはやはり
ハウゼルの持ち物ってことか」
昼間、戦場で拾った本をランスが取り出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the day, Rance took out the book he had picked up on the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、間違いなくハウゼルのだ。
ほら、ここ見てみろ」
「ハウゼルが使ってる図書館の刻印と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The stamp of the library Housel uses and,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貸し出しリストに名前が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her name is on the lending list."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼル、ハウゼル、ハウゼル……
